questions.title: Design a Real-Time Chat System
questions.prompt: Design a real-time chat system. Cover: message delivery, ordering, online presence, and scaling.
followups: How do you handle offline delivery and retries?
What consistency guarantees can you provide?

questions.title: Distributed Rate Limiter
questions.prompt: Design a distributed rate limiter for an API gateway. Explain how you keep counters consistent and fast.
followups: What storage do you use (Redis) and why?
How do you handle clock skew or bursts?

questions.title: Top K Frequent Elements
questions.prompt: Given an integer array nums and an integer k, return the k most frequent elements. Discuss multiple approaches.
followups: Can you do better than O(n log n)?
Whatâ€™s the complexity of each approach?

questions.title: Design Twitter or News Feed
questions.prompt: Design a scalable news feed system like Twitter. Cover: fan-out strategies, ranking, and real-time updates.
followups: Compare push vs pull models for feed generation
How do you handle celebrity users with millions of followers?

questions.title: Design Uber/Lyft
questions.prompt: Design a ride-sharing service. Cover: real-time matching, location tracking, pricing, and driver dispatch.
followups: How do you handle surge pricing algorithmically?
What data structures optimize nearest driver lookup?

questions.title: Design YouTube or Netflix
questions.prompt: Design a video streaming platform. Cover: video encoding, CDN distribution, recommendations, and analytics.
followups: How do you handle adaptive bitrate streaming?
What about live streaming vs on-demand?

questions.title: Design a Distributed Cache
questions.prompt: Design a distributed cache like Redis Cluster. Cover: sharding, replication, consistency, and eviction policies.
followups: How do you handle cache invalidation across nodes?
What consistency model (strong vs eventual) would you choose?

questions.title: Design Amazon's Shopping Cart
questions.prompt: Design a highly available shopping cart for Amazon-scale traffic. Cover: persistence, concurrency, and checkout.
followups: How do you handle cart abandonment and recovery?
What about price changes while items are in cart?

questions.title: Design Google Docs
questions.prompt: Design a collaborative document editing system. Cover: operational transforms, conflict resolution, and real-time sync.
followups: Compare OT vs CRDT for conflict resolution
How do you handle offline editing?

questions.title: Design a Distributed Job Scheduler
questions.prompt: Design a system like Apache Airflow or Kubernetes CronJob at scale. Cover: scheduling, execution, monitoring, and fault tolerance.
followups: How do you ensure exactly-once execution?
What about dependency management between jobs?

questions.title: Design a Payment System
questions.prompt: Design a payment processing system for an e-commerce platform. Cover: idempotency, fraud detection, and reconciliation.
followups: How do you handle split payments and refunds?
What about PCI compliance and security?

questions.title: Design a Search Engine
questions.prompt: Design a web search engine. Cover: crawling, indexing, ranking, and query processing at scale.
followups: How do you handle freshness of indexed content?
What about personalization and location-based results?

questions.title: Design a Social Network
questions.prompt: Design a social network like Facebook. Cover: friend graph, news feed, messaging, and privacy controls.
followups: How do you store and query social graphs efficiently?
What about content moderation and spam detection?

questions.title: Design a URL Shortener at Scale
questions.prompt: Design a URL shortener serving billions of requests per day. Cover: key generation, redirection, analytics, and anti-abuse.
followups: How do you handle vanity URLs and custom slugs?
What about link expiration and cleanup?

questions.title: Design a Recommendation System
questions.prompt: Design a personalized recommendation system for an e-commerce or content platform. Cover: data collection, model serving, and A/B testing.
followups: How do you handle cold start for new users/items?
What metrics measure recommendation quality?

questions.title: Design an Ad Server
questions.prompt: Design an online advertising platform. Cover: ad targeting, auction systems, billing, and click fraud detection.
followups: How do you implement real-time bidding (RTB)?
What about viewability and attribution tracking?

questions.title: Design a Stock Trading Platform
questions.prompt: Design a real-time stock trading platform. Cover: order matching, market data, risk checks, and compliance.
followups: How do you ensure order fairness and prevent front-running?
What about circuit breakers and volatility controls?

questions.title: Design a Distributed File System
questions.prompt: Design a distributed file system like Google File System or HDFS. Cover: metadata management, replication, and consistency.
followups: How do you handle data durability and repair?
What about small file problem and garbage collection?

questions.title: Design a Multiplayer Game Server
questions.prompt: Design a server for a real-time multiplayer game. Cover: game state synchronization, cheat prevention, and matchmaking.
followups: How do you handle lag compensation and prediction?
What about leaderboards and player progression?

questions.title: Design a Hotel/Airline Booking System
questions.prompt: Design a booking system with inventory management, pricing, and reservations. Cover: overbooking and cancellation policies.
followups: How do you prevent double booking in distributed system?
What about dynamic pricing based on demand?

questions.title: Design a Distributed Logging System
questions.prompt: Design a system like Splunk or ELK at scale. Cover: log ingestion, indexing, search, and retention.
followups: How do you handle structured vs unstructured logs?
What about real-time alerting and anomaly detection?

questions.title: Design a Content Delivery Network
questions.prompt: Design a CDN from scratch. Cover: edge caching, origin shielding, and load balancing.
followups: How do you handle cache invalidation globally?
What about DDoS protection and security?

questions.title: Design a Distributed Database
questions.prompt: Design a distributed database system. Cover: partitioning, replication, consensus, and query processing.
followups: How do you handle cross-partition transactions?
What about schema changes and migrations?

questions.title: Design a Real-time Analytics Platform
questions.prompt: Design a system for real-time analytics on streaming data. Cover: data ingestion, windowed aggregations, and dashboarding.
followups: How do you handle late arriving data?
What about data quality and schema evolution?

questions.title: Design an IoT Platform
questions.prompt: Design a platform for millions of IoT devices. Cover: device management, telemetry, commands, and firmware updates.
followups: How do you handle unreliable network connections?
What about security and device authentication?

questions.title: Design a Cryptocurrency Exchange
questions.prompt: Design a cryptocurrency exchange. Cover: order books, wallet management, blockchain integration, and security.
followups: How do you prevent trading bots from gaming the system?
What about hot/cold wallet security?

questions.title: Design a Mobile Banking App Backend
questions.prompt: Design the backend for a mobile banking app. Cover: account management, transactions, fraud detection, and compliance.
followups: How do you ensure ACID compliance for financial transactions?
What about regulatory reporting and audit trails?

questions.title: Design a Travel Itinerary Planner
questions.prompt: Design a system that plans multi-city travel itineraries with flights, hotels, and activities.
followups: How do you optimize for price, time, and preferences?
What about real-time availability and pricing?

questions.title: Design a Video Conferencing System
questions.prompt: Design a system like Zoom or Google Meet. Cover: signaling, media servers, recording, and scalability.
followups: How do you handle network variability and quality adaptation?
What about breakout rooms and screen sharing?

questions.title: Design a Food Delivery Platform
questions.prompt: Design a food delivery platform like Uber Eats or DoorDash. Cover: order routing, real-time tracking, and payments.
followups: How do you optimize delivery routes in real-time?
What about restaurant capacity and preparation time estimation?

questions.title: Design a Healthcare Records System
questions.prompt: Design a HIPAA-compliant electronic health records system. Cover: data privacy, access controls, and interoperability.
followups: How do you handle data anonymization for research?
What about emergency access and audit logging?

questions.title: Design a Smart Home Platform
questions.prompt: Design a platform for controlling and automating smart home devices. Cover: device discovery, scenes, and voice control.
followups: How do you handle local vs cloud control?
What about device firmware updates and compatibility?

questions.title: Design a Fitness Tracking Platform
questions.prompt: Design a platform like Strava or Fitbit. Cover: activity tracking, social features, and health insights.
followups: How do you handle data from various wearable devices?
What about privacy controls for sharing activity data?

questions.title: Design a Code Hosting Platform
questions.prompt: Design a system like GitHub or GitLab. Cover: repository management, pull requests, CI/CD, and collaboration.
followups: How do you handle large binary files (Git LFS)?
What about access controls and audit trails?

questions.title: Design a Location-Based Service
questions.prompt: Design a location-based service like Yelp or Foursquare. Cover: geospatial queries, reviews, and recommendations.
followups: How do you optimize for nearest neighbor queries?
What about handling location spoofing and fake reviews?

questions.title: Design a Learning Management System
questions.prompt: Design a platform like Coursera or Udemy. Cover: course delivery, progress tracking, assignments, and certifications.
followups: How do you handle video streaming and interactive content?
What about plagiarism detection and exam proctoring?

questions.title: Design a Distributed Messaging Queue
questions.prompt: Design a system like Kafka or RabbitMQ at scale. Cover: partitioning, replication, ordering guarantees, and durability.
followups: How do you ensure exactly-once semantics?
What about consumer lag monitoring and rebalancing?

questions.title: Design a Real-time Sports Analytics Platform
questions.prompt: Design a system that processes real-time sports data for live commentary, stats, and predictions.
followups: How do you handle data from multiple sources and sensors?
What about latency requirements for live betting applications?

questions.title: Design an AI/ML Model Serving Platform
questions.prompt: Design a platform for serving machine learning models at scale. Cover: model deployment, A/B testing, and monitoring.
followups: How do you handle model versioning and rollbacks?
What about prediction explainability and bias monitoring?

questions.title: Design a Distributed Configuration Management System
questions.prompt: Design a system like etcd or ZooKeeper for distributed configuration and service discovery.
followups: How do you handle network partitions and consensus?
What about watch mechanisms and change notifications?

questions.title: Design a Digital Asset Management System
questions.prompt: Design a system for storing, organizing, and retrieving digital assets (images, videos, documents).
followups: How do you handle asset versioning and transformations?
What about metadata extraction and search?
